On the next screen, you will be prompted to grant access to read and write some of your general and health information, such as height, weight, and steps taken so you don't have to enter it again.
immediate

We appreciate your time.
Thank you for your contribution to this study. We are sorry that you could not continue.
Welcome back!
BeatHF Consent Form
Welcome to BeatHF. A better way to reduce hospital readmissions for heart failure in non-hospitalized patients with heart failure to improve outcomes, improve quality of life, and reduce cost
Participants must be patients with advanced congestive heart failure. The survey will help prevent the re-admission of such patients. The survey will take 10-15 minutes.

All information taken from the survey will be used to mitigate any risk of heart failure. â€¢ Your responses will be used to recommend actions to be taken by you and will not be shared with anyone other than you. â€¢ Your information will not be shared with anyone outside the study staff. â€¢ Data collection and survey responses using the internet will encounter the same risks that a person would encounter in their daily use of the internet, such as information being seen unintentionally by others. â€¢ Your name or any personal identifying information will not be shared in articles or talks.
The data collected in the survey will be used solely to identify any symptoms that might indicate a heart failure and to treat these symptoms with oral medications.
This survey consists of 10 questions and will not take more than 10 minutes of your time.
This survey is to study the different health indicators to identify any abnormalities and to prescribe oral medications to overcome these abnormalities and hence prevent re-admission

The obtained survey answers are checked against set thresholds to identify if you might have a heart failure and require re-admission. At the end of the survey, a feedback is provided based on the performance of the check mentioned above. The feedback may be to call 911, contact your doctor today or to contact your doctor right away.
If at any time you decide to withdraw from the survey, you can do so by closing your web browser.
